nodes.name: 1. Get Finance Transactions (Google Sheets)
nodes.description: Reads monthly finance transaction data from the specified Google Sheet.

nodes.name: 2. Filter Previous Month Transactions
nodes.description: Filters the raw data to only include transactions from the previous full month.

nodes.name: 3. Generate AI Financial Insights

parameters.prompt:
You are a finance assistant. Analyze the following transaction data. Calculate the total income and total expense for the period. Then, provide 3 concise bullet-point financial insights based on the data. Structure your output clearly:

Total Income: [Amount]
Total Expense: [Amount]
Key Insights:
- [Insight 1]
- [Insight 2]
- [Insight 3]

Transactions:
{{JSON.stringify($json, null, 2)}}

nodes.description: Uses OpenAI (GPT-4) to generate a summary of income, expenses, and key financial insights.

nodes.name: 4. Send Monthly Finance Report Email

parameters.subject: Monthly Finance Summary and AI Insights

nodes.description: Composes and sends the monthly finance report email, including transaction details and AI insights.

parameters.content: # Документация по рабочему процессу: Ежемесячный финансовый отчет с анализом ИИ
